publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7810 Kenneth Gibson: Jim Miller—That the Parliament recognises what it considers the outstanding voluntary service given over many years by Mr Jim Miller of Caledonia Road, Saltcoats, to the people and communities of North Ayrshire and congratulates Mr Miller on the award of a commendation from the Ayrshire Divisional Commander of Strathclyde Police for his work with the community safety officers of both Saltcoats and Irvine and for his dedication to neighbourhood watch across North Ayrshire.

S3M-7810 Kenneth Gibson: Jim Miller—That the Parliament recognises what it considers the outstanding voluntary service given over many years by Mr Jim Miller of Caledonia Road, Saltcoats, to the people and communities of North Ayrshire and congratulates Mr Miller on the award of a commendation from the Ayrshire Divisional Commander of Strathclyde Police for his work with the community safety officers of both Saltcoats and Irvine and for his dedication to neighbourhood watch across North Ayrshire.
